rdf:Description.dc:title: Commercial greenhouse tomato production in Alberta 2003
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Calpas, James.
Alberta. Alberta Agriculture, Food and Rural Development.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Agriculture, Food and Rural Development, Information Packaging Centre,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The author wishes to give special recognition to Pat Cote, Scott Graham, and Lori Puchaillo, the other members of the Greenhouse Crops Team at the Crop Diversification Centre South in Brooks, whose technical expertise in greenhouse vegetable production in Alberta forms the basis for specific cultural recommendations."

"This manual was submitted in fulfillment of the course requirements for AFNS 603 (Graduate Reading Project) as part of the requirements of the Ph.D. program at the University of Alberta supervised by Dr. J.P. Tewari."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Tomatoes
Tomatoes
Greenhouse plants
Greenhouse management
